name: NUS Past Year Papers Downloader
description: A very helpful tool to help you download past year papers from the library portal by module in bulk.
author: Oh Shunhao, Liu Xinan and Tay Yang Shun

name: NUS Buses
description: Need up-to-date bus timings on your favourite bus stops? Unsure of which buses to take? Introducing the new NUS Buses app, with its modern UI that is responsive and intuitive, making your journeys a better experience. NUS Buses comes with your favourite real time bus arrivals, bus routes and even the ability to favourite the bus stops you frequent.
author: Marcus Koh Chi Hao

name: Matriculation Number Calculator
description: Get the last digit of an NUS student's matriculation number!
author: Eu Beng Hee

name: NUS NextBus
description: Download the NUS Next Bus application to get up-to-the-minute bus schedules and be informed well ahead of the next bus‚Äô arrival time. The application also comes with detailed maps of the bus stop locations and the user‚Äôs current location within NUS.
author: NUS

name: NUS Carparks
description: Get up-to-the-minute carparks availability information within the National University of Singapore (NUS). The application also comes with detailed maps of the carparks locations and the user's current location in NUS.
author: NUS

name: uWave
description: uWave is a student all-in-one mobile app üìÜ Student Timetable, ‚è± Finals countdown in Timetable, üöå Public Bus Timings + Campus Shuttle Location, üìç NUS Campus Maps, üí¨ NUS Discussions, üèì List of all CCAs in NUS, üßß Student discounts
author: Wave

name: From The Future
description: A simple & easy way to add & view advice for NUS Computing freshmen.
author: Liu Yongliang

name: Lominus
description: Lominus is a tool to automatically sync Luminus files onto your local storage for easy access at a fixed interval of your choice, amongst many other features. It is designed to run on Windows, macOS and Linux operating systems.
author: Lee Jia Wei and Lee Jia Jun
